div.span: School for the Remainder of this School Year

li.div: Farmington Schools will be doing AMI days for the remainder of the school year.

a.title: Update from Superintendent Law
a.div: Please click here to read update!

a.title: Folsom Kindergarten Graduation
a.div:
Bob Folsom Elementary Kindergarten online registration is now open!
Click the link below-
You can attach a copy of your birth certificate, shot record, social security card, and proof of physical. OR you may drop off these documents to be added to your registration at Folsom’s office- when it is safe to do so.
Students enrolling must be 5 years of age by August 1, 2020.
https://form.jotform.com/200996832535160

a.title: Williams Kindergarten Registration
a.div:
You can attach a copy of your birth certificate, shot record, social security card and proof of physical. You may also drop the needed documents by the office to be added to your registration when it is safe to do so.
Students enrolling must be 5 years of age by August 1, 2020.
Click here

li.div: Auditions for the 2020/2021 Crimson Select Ensemble (honor choir) will be submitted online. Please join the new Google Classroom with the code n7xu6m4 for all audition information. All currently enrolled 9th, 10th and 11th graders are welcomed to audition. Email Mrs. Jackson (ljackson@farmcards.org) with any questions.

div.span: 20/21 Jr High Advance Treble Choir Auditions

li.div: Auditions for the 2020/2021 Jr High Advanced Treble Choir will be submitted online. Please join the new Google Classroom with the code w4hkxoa for all audition information. All currently enrolled 7th and 8th graders are welcomed to audition. Email Mrs. Jackson (ljackson@farmcards.org) with any questions

p.span: Farmington Public Schools provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
